content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position y1)

### Iron plate production facility at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check if the tile is occupied by another entity.

### Errors when attempting to inspect furnace inventory
- Ensure that the furnace is operational and has items in its inventory before inspecting it.
